changeSet.createView: SELECT b.id, dp.name AS defining_product, b.key, b.reference, b.type, b.notes, up.name AS updated_by, b.version FROM ruleform.workspace_authorization b JOIN ruleform.agency up ON b.updated_by = up.id JOIN ruleform.product dp ON b.defining_product = dp.id
